Name: 荒土之上 On Wasteland
About the game: This is a sophomore students made the game DEMO, was originally as a personal practice, gradually improve after I found the part program has been very good, so free open to everybody, all art material resources from the Unity store, please forgive me for not art, the game is very simple, you can control a hero in a sealed move on the mainland, At the same time, monsters will be refreshed on the continent. You can right-click on normal attacks or press Q to attack them with skills and gain experience points and gold, which you can buy equipment (currently only consumables). As you level up, you will become more and more powerful, and the cycle will continue forever
